A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing.  Loved TFA and RO\, but this was a mess.  The chemistry between Rey and Finn was thrown out for this episode.  Luke out of character as a shattered mess who considered killing his nephew (after always believing there was good in his father) and literally milking an alien?  Really?  Flying Leia?  How did that honor Ms. Fisher's memory?  New characters for which no interest is developed.  Cute little creatures only in the movie for the purpose of selling toys\, perhaps?  All the women are brilliant but the men are lacking (I'm a woman saying this)?  RJ never should have been given this\, and it leaves me with concern as he looks toward Ep 10 - 12.
